SENT.plain: A 66 year-old woman presented with a tight but asymptomatic atheromatous stenosis in a persistant carotido-hypoglossal artery
Stenosis was documented by ultrasound Doppler tomography whereas the embryologic anomaly was disclosed by digital angiography
A successful venous bypass was done
Based on this case report, the diagnostic and therapeutic problems raised by such anomalies are discussed
